channel.title: I need help with my smffforfree forum
channel.description: if you can lend me a hand and pm me, i need help with my smfforfree forum, how do i make new SECTIONS so people can post threads there for exmaple, like a trading section, and a tutorial section! also, how do i sticky threads? thanks will rep!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2007, 12:25:32 AM[/size][hr]EDIT fixed the sticky situation thanks![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2007, 12:28:13 AM[/size][hr]how do i make it so that you can rep people?

item.title: I need help with my smffforfree forum
item.dc:creator: @motoxnick motoxnick
item.description:
@motoxnick wrote:

You click on there name and go to Account Realated Settings and change there…

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with my smffforfree forum
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

ok thanks, and how do i make someone a forum admin

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my smffforfree forum

item.title: I need help with my smffforfree forum
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

go into admin section, click on features and options. click the ‘karma’ button, enable total karma if you want. set the posts someone needs to modify rep, set whether you want admins to have to wait or not. then rename karma to w/e you want and same with applaud and smite to rep++ or w/e you want. hope this helps.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my smffforfree forum
